text: Hi all, I have a question, is there a possibility of increasing the 50Mb limit of `hs project upload` ?
Where did you get this information?
I'm getting this limit error when I try to run project upload where my serverless functions combined file size are more than 50Mb
As far as I know, the limit has been raised to 250 MB.
can you please share where that information is coming from I might find  some reasons why I'm getting this error

Hey Sierra, good to see you again, been a minute!

Basically you know the action buttons on the CRM records? It would be awesome to be able to add a button here that could do a few things:
1. open modals
2. take the user a CRM card

Hi Ryan, I see you had to replace sharp with jimp. That would mean that Sharp still doesn't work when you deploy the project but works locally?

Are you using `sharp` as a library for your serverles?
Correct
That's not an expected bahavior. I will take this up with internal teams to investigate more. Would you please share your portal ID?
I will in a second.  Did you see the open issue in GitHub regarding sharp library?

Hey Ryan, love to see how you hack around our component limitations. I'm curious to show how the interactions on the radio select you custom-implemented works. Can you share a GIF when you get a chance?
Hi Jeff, thank you for raising this. Can you tell me what does your project look like? And also share your project name + portal ID?
`<https://api.example.com>` Is only kept as an example for the getting started project. Your `allowedUrls` need to contain the actual URLs you use inside `HubSpot.fetch()`.
Hello Sebastien, UI extensions are not available for mobile app at the moment. Can you please tell me more about your use case?
Hi, yes, I only used that as an example to avoid posting our real url. I have deployed using our actual url.
Hi Ryan, you can build a public app to distribute in a marketplace without needing any enterprise accounts. However, to build a private app just for your account, you need enterprise.
Can you tell me more about what you mean by dimension limit?
The App Id is <tel:5514027|5514027>

Thanks for clarifying. Just to make sure, did you upload the project again after updating `allowedUrl`? A good way to check would be to see if your app's information screen on developer account shows the right `allowedUrl`
Yes, I can see that allowedUrls are populated in the public-app.json of deployed build (e.g going to Projects > Deployed build > #24). However it doesn’t show up in the UI, see the provided image.
Can you share your developer account id?
Sure, the dev account is <tel:143799303|143799303>

> Did you see the open issue in GitHub regarding sharp library?
No.
<https://github.com/npm/cli/issues/4828|https://github.com/npm/cli/issues/4828>
I think this is the problem - maybe you can help confirm
I'm remote and will send account ID when I'm back at my desk

Hi <@U03FJQPSC0Y> I have two use case examples. The first is a client who wants to survey customers from past deals and is on-site with the client. He wants to be able to fill out the UI extension survey on his mobile while with the client. The second one involves a quoting tool, where the sales rep may be on the road and wants to build a quote while at the customer’s warehouse.
Local dev mode appears to be getting stuck for this card, despite it being a basic example app. While `hs project upload` works fine, dev mode isn't functioning properly for some reason.
CC: <@U029AJZHMPV>
Hey Carter, can you tell me more on what 'getting stuck' would mean here? As in, are you not seeing your local changes? Or you are not able to quit the local dev mode?
Basically local dev mode never starts and you can't quit out of dev mode either
running on 7.1.1
Thanks for more details
Did you change anything today for the card or your system?
<@U029AJZHMPV> will have to confirm but this look like it's just the example card
Yes it is just the example card no changes
Sent as a DM
What's reasoning behind this?

Hi everyone. Wondering if there is a way to add an new line item associated to a deal, via a custom CRM card, chosen from my product library ?

I'm currently using a `CrmActionButton` with `actionType="OPEN_RECORD_ASSOCIATION_FORM"` but when adding a new line item it is only pulling a choice of my existing line items, and not my product library. Any advise would hugely appreciated!
Are you passing in actionContext?
Products are objectTypeId 0-7
Line-items are instances of products
I haven't tested this but I have a theory
Try changing 0-8 with 0-7
OH that has worked - thank you so much. How didn't I see that ... :woman-facepalming: thanks so much for your help!
